trans-unit.source: Use <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.BIND_OPTS"></xref> instead.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx` in the com subfolder of the MSDN library.
Enumerate the strings which are the keys of the internally-maintained table of contextual object parameters.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::EnumObjectParam` in the MSDN library.
On successful return, a reference to the object parameter enumerator.
Return the current binding options stored in this bind context.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::GetBindOptions` in the MSDN library.
A pointer to the structure to receive the binding options.
Lookup the given key in the internally-maintained table of contextual object parameters and return the corresponding object, if one exists.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::GetObjectParam` in the MSDN library.
The name of the object to search for.
On successful return, the object interface pointer.
Return access to the Running Object Table (ROT) relevant to this binding process.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::GetRunningObjectTable` in the MSDN library.
On successful return, a reference to the ROT.
Register the passed object as one of the objects that has been bound during a moniker operation and which should be released when it is complete.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::RegisterObjectBound` in the MSDN library.
The object to register for release.
Register the given object pointer under the specified name in the internally-maintained table of object pointers.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::RegisterObjectParam` in the MSDN library.
The name to register punk with.
The object to register.
Releases all the objects currently registered with the bind context by <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIBindCtx.RegisterObjectBound(System.Object)"></xref>.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::ReleaseBoundObjects` in the MSDN library.
Removes the object from the set of registered objects that need to be released.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::RevokeObjectBound` in the MSDN library.
The object to unregister for release.
Revoke the registration of the object currently found under this key in the internally-maintained table of contextual object parameters, if any such key is currently registered.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::RevokeObjectParam` in the MSDN library.
The key to unregister.
Store in the bind context a block of parameters that will apply to later `UCOMIMoniker` operations using this bind context.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IBindCtx::SetBindOptions` in the MSDN library.
The structure containing the binding options to set.
